Food with Matthew.title: Food with Matthew
Food with Matthew.advice1: If the issue is not serious, wait a few more days and observe behavior
Food with Matthew.advice2: Mention the issue, but be sure not to place blame
Food with Matthew.advice3: Communicate your concerns and why it is important to you
Food with Matthew.q1: Have you been able to observe any additional behavior?
